Place your images here:

  RAJAMANIKYAM.jpg     - First show (Rajamanikyam)
  CHOTTAMUMBAI.jpg     - Second show (Chotta Mumbai)
  main-auditorium.jpg  - Main Auditorium venue photo (shown on theatre selection)

Then run in backend:  npm run seed   (movies)
                      npm run seed:theatres   (theatres / venue image)
